divs: Sighting DetailsWhile standing on the deck having a smoke I noticed what I thought was the moon initially was less than half full with straight bottom, but it was moon color blue, (which i didnt think about at the time), it was a half moon, glowing orange, red pulsating, beautiful fire ball and when I that was disappearing from the bottom towards the top as if something was closing, when I ran to get the cell phone for camera, something inside me said its going to be gone when you come back, this was clearly and plainly visible now, it tooks to seconds and when I got back it was gone, then it reappeared not as bright but in the shape of a crown, but same color and same glow, but not as distinct, but I could still clearly see it and it just faded away, gone, I stayed for about 30 minutes focused directly on the spot and nothing, I woke this mourning looking at place in sky and nothing... Ive been a UFO student and believer for a long time, but this is the first sighting if that what it was I've ever experienced... If you have any questions you can email me on contact me, this is not a lie this is the whole hearted Gods honest truth, incredible activity....
